docblock.description: Represents a route definition, either a single route or a set of attached routes.
docblock.long-description: In general, you should never need to instantiate a Defintion directly. Use the DefinitionFactory instead, or the Map.

docblock.description: The type of definition, typically 'single' or 'attach'.
The spec for the definition.
For 'attach' definitions, the prefix for all attached route paths.
Constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The definition type.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The definition spec.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The prefix for 'attach' paths.

docblock.description: Returns the definition type.
Returns the definition spec, converting callable along the way, and setting the path_prefix on 'attach' definitions.
This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php BSD

docblock.description: A factory to create Definition objects.
Returns a new Definition instance.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The type of definition, 'single' or 'attach'.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The definition spec: either an array, or a callable that returns an array.

tag.name: param
tag.description: For 'attach' definitions, use this as the prefix for attached paths.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php BSD

docblock.description: Package-specific exception.

docblock.description: A collection point for URI routes.
Currently processing this attached common route information.
Currently processing these attached routes.
Route definitions; these will be converted into objects.
A RouteFactory for creating route objects.
Route objects created from the definitons.
Logging information about which routes were attempted to match.
Constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A factory for creating definition objects.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A factory for creating route objects.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A series of route definitions to be attached to the router.

docblock.description: Adds a single route definition to the stack.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The route name for `generate()` lookups.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The route path.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The rest of the route definition, with keys for `params`, `values`, etc.

docblock.description: Attaches several routes at once to a specific path prefix.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path that the routes should be attached to.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of common route information, with an additional `routes` key to define the routes themselves.

docblock.description: Gets a route that matches a given path and other server conditions.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path to match against.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array copy of $_SERVER.

tag.name: return
tag.description: Returns a Route object when it finds a match, or boolean false if there is no match.

docblock.description: Looks up a route by name, and interpolates data into it to return a URI path.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The route name to look up.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The data to inpterolate into the URI; data keys map to param tokens in the path.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A URI path string if the route name is found, or boolean false if not.

docblock.description: Reset the map to use an array of Route objects.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Use this array of route objects, likely generated from `getRoutes()`.

docblock.description: Get the array of Route objects in this map, likely for caching and re-setting via `setRoutes()`.
Get the log of attempted route matches.
Add a route to the log of attempted matches.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Route object

docblock.description: Gets the next Route object in the stack, converting definitions to Route objects as needed.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A Route object, or boolean false at the end of the stack.

docblock.description: Gets the next route definition from the stack.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A route definition.

docblock.description: Gets the next attached route definition.

tag.name: return
tag.description: A route definition.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php BSD

docblock.description: Represents an individual route with a name, path, params, values, etc.
docblock.long-description: In general, you should never need to instantiate a Route directly. Use the RouteFactory instead, or the Map.

docblock.description: The name for this Route.
The path for this Route with param tokens.
A map of param tokens to their regex subpatterns.
A map of param tokens to their default values; if this Route is matched, these will retain the corresponding values from the param tokens in the matching path.
The `REQUEST_METHOD` value must match one of the methods in this array; method; e.g., `'GET'` or `['POST', 'DELETE']`.
When true, the `HTTPS` value must be `on`, or the `SERVER_PORT` must be 443.
docblock.long-description: When false, neither of those values may be present. When null, it is ignored.

docblock.description: A callable to provide custom matching logic against the server values and matched params from this Route.
docblock.long-description: The signature must be function(array $server, \ArrayObject $matches) and must return a boolean: true to accept this Route match, or false to deny the match. Note that this allows a wide range of manipulations, and further allows the developer to modify the matched params as needed.

docblock.description: A callable to modify path-generation values.
docblock.long-description: The signature must be function($route, array $data); its return value is an array of data to be used in the path. The $route is this Route object, and $data is the set of key-value pairs to be interpolated into the path as provided by the caller.

docblock.description: If routable, this route should be used in matching.
docblock.long-description: If not, it should be used only to generate a path.

docblock.description: A prefix for the Route name, generally from attached route groups.
A prefix for the Route path, generally from attached route groups.
The $path property converted to a regular expression, using the $params subpatterns.
All param matches found in the path during the `isMatch()` process.
Retain debugging information about why the route did not match.
Constructor.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The name for this Route.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path for this Route with param token placeholders.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Map of param tokens to regex subpatterns.

tag.name: param
tag.description: Default values for params.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The server REQUUEST_METHOD must be one of these values.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If true, the server must indicate an HTTPS request.

tag.name: param
tag.description: If true, this Route can be matched; if not, it can be used only to generate a path.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A custom callable to evaluate the route.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A custom callable to generate a path.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A prefix for the name.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A prefix for the path.

docblock.description: Magic read-only for all properties.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The property to read from.

docblock.description: Checks if a given path and server values are a match for this Route.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path to check against this Route.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A copy of $_SERVER so that this Route can check against the server values.

docblock.description: Gets the path for this Route with data replacements for param tokens.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of key-value pairs to interpolate into the param tokens in the path for this Route. Keys that do not map to params are discarded; param tokens that have no mapped key are left in place.

docblock.description: Sets the regular expression for this Route based on its params.
Checks that the path matches the Route regex.

tag.name: param
tag.description: The path to match against.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on a match, false if not.

docblock.description: Checks that the Route `$method` matches the corresponding server value.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A copy of $_SERVER.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on a match, false if not.

docblock.description: Checks that the Route `$secure` matches the corresponding server values.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A copy of $_SERVER.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on a match, false if not.

docblock.description: Checks that the custom Route `$is_match` callable returns true, given the server values.

tag.name: param
tag.description: A copy of $_SERVER.

tag.name: return
tag.description: True on a match, false if not.

docblock.description: This file is part of the Aura Project for PHP.

tag.name: license
tag.description: http://opensource.org/licenses/bsd-license.php BSD

docblock.description: A factory to create Route objects.

property.name: $params
property.default: array('name' => null, 'path' => null, 'params' => null, 'values' => null, 'method' => null, 'secure' => null, 'routable' => true, 'is_match' => null, 'generate' => null, 'name_prefix' => null, 'path_prefix' => null)

docblock.description: An array of default parameters for Route objects.
Returns a new Route instance.

tag.name: param
tag.description: An array of key-value pairs corresponding to the Route parameters.
